official_title: A Practice-Provider-Parent-Adolescent Intervention to Increase HPV Vaccination
inclusion_criteria:
* Adolescent males and females aged 11-12 years and their parents
* No previous receipt of any HPV vaccine dose by the adolescent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 11 Years
Must have maximum age of 12 Years
miscellaneous_criteria: Parents are enrolled into the study based on their children meeting age and prior vaccination requirements.
